title: Arise to His World of Infamy

chunks.lyrics: SONG: Arise to His World of Infamy
PM- Palm mute * - Pinch Harmonic ^ - strum upwards
\ - Slide down > - let ring x - pick slide
Riff 1A is played once as the song begins to fade in
NOTE: The sweeping in the beginning is not what he plays and is very hard
to decipher because of the fade-in, but it is close enough so that it still
sounds good, if anyone knows what he is doing, contact me.
Riff 1A x4 (I'll lick your wounds with my poisonous tongue...)
Pt.B (note that the timing of the chords for GTR.II is a tad different)
(ALL NOTES ARE PALM MUTED, EXCEPT FOR SLIDES)
(ALL NOTES ARE PALM MUTED, EXCEPT FOR SLIDES)
Pt.B (note that the timing of the chords for GTR.II is a tad different)
Riff 2 (I spread my wings so bloodied and torn...)
PM PM PM-----| PM PM PM
